activities: Provide a usability research platform that connects client companies with individual users and consumers to provide qualitative feedback on websites and applications.  Such service may require the collection of basics demographics and other personal information when screening for qualified participants for clients' test studies.
contactoff1: 2672 Bayshore Parkway, Suite 703, Mountain View, CA 94043
personaldata: Clients and Testers (i.e. Users/consumers who register on our panel to participate in screen and voice recorded usability studies of our clients)
